name: Noisetoys 2 - Acid & Drum
description:
Noisetoys 2 is an electronic, sample based drum machine.

Featuring: 

  • 16 drumkits with sounds from the TR-808 to the Speak and spell.
  • A subtractive synth with a real acid feel.
  • An easy to use 16 step sequencer.
  • Various audio effects.
    • And of course most importantly: FAT BEATS!!!
